purpose: Provides help information for React Terminal commands.
Launches a specified URL in a new tab or separate window.
help: Launches a specified URL in a new tab or separate window.
URL......................The website you want to open.
NAME......................Returns a hello response to the user with the specified name.

purpose: Returns the exact input to the user.
help: Returns the exact input to the user.
INPUT......................Returns the typed input to the user as it was typed.

purpose: Quits the React Terminal and returns to Josh's portfolio page.
Resets terminal to the original state.
Sets the window title for the React Terminal.
help: Sets the window title for the React Terminal.
INPUT....................The title you want to use for the React Terminal window.
